mojo.description:
Display help information on pitest-maven.
Call mvn pitest:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: Goal which runs a coverage mutation report

parameter.name: additionalClasspathElements
parameter.description: List of additional classpath entries to use when looking for tests and mutable code. These will be used in addition to the classpath with which PIT is launched.

parameter.name: classpathDependencyExcludes
parameter.description: List of classpath entries, formatted as "groupId:artifactId", which should not be included in the classpath when running mutation tests. Modelled after the corresponding Surefire/Failsafe property.

parameter.name: coverageThreshold
parameter.description: Line coverage threshold at which to fail build

parameter.name: detectInlinedCode
parameter.description: Detect inlined code

parameter.name: environmentVariables
parameter.description:
environment configuration
Value pairs may be used by pitest plugins.

parameter.name: excludedClasses
parameter.description: Classes not to mutate or run tests from

parameter.name: excludedGroups
parameter.description: TestNG Groups/JUnit Categories to exclude

parameter.name: excludedMethods
parameter.description: Methods not to mutate

parameter.name: exportLineCoverage
parameter.description: Export line coverage data

parameter.name: failWhenNoMutations
parameter.description: Throw error if no mutations found

parameter.name: historyInputFile
parameter.description: File to read history from for incremental analysis (can be same as output file)

parameter.name: historyOutputFile
parameter.description: File to write history information to for incremental analysis

parameter.name: includedGroups
parameter.description: TestNG Groups/JUnit Categories to include

parameter.name: jvm
parameter.description: Path to java executable to use when running tests. Will default to executable in JAVA_HOME if none set.

parameter.name: jvmArgs
parameter.description: Arguments to pass to child processes

parameter.name: maxDependencyDistance
parameter.description: Maximum distance to look from test to class. Relevant when mutating static initializers

parameter.name: maxMutationsPerClass
parameter.description: Maximum number of mutations to allow per class

parameter.name: mutateStaticInitializers
parameter.description: Mutate static initializers

parameter.name: mutationEngine
parameter.description: Engine to use when generating mutations.

parameter.name: mutationThreshold
parameter.description: Mutation score threshold at which to fail build

parameter.name: mutationUnitSize
parameter.description: Maximum number of mutations to include in a single analysis unit.

parameter.name: mutators
parameter.description: Mutation operators to apply

parameter.name: outputFormats
parameter.description: Formats to output during analysis phase

parameter.name: parseSurefireConfig
parameter.description: When set will try and create settings based on surefire configuration. This may not give the desired result in some circumstances

parameter.name: pluginArtifactMap
parameter.description: Internal: Map of plugin artifacts.

parameter.name: pluginConfiguration
parameter.description:
Configuration properties.
Value pairs may be used by pitest plugins.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: Internal: Project to interact with.

parameter.name: reportsDirectory
parameter.description: Base directory where all reports are written to.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: When set indicates that analysis of this project should be skipped

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: honours common skipTests flag in a maven run

parameter.name: targetClasses
parameter.description: Classes to include in mutation test

parameter.name: targetTests
parameter.description: Tests to run

parameter.name: threads
parameter.description: Number of threads to use

parameter.name: timeoutConstant
parameter.description: Constant factor to allow for timeouts

parameter.name: timeoutFactor
parameter.description: Weighting to allow for timeouts

parameter.name: timestampedReports
parameter.description: Create timestamped subdirectory for report

parameter.name: useSlf4j
parameter.description: Use slf4j for logging

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: Output verbose logging

mojo.description: Generates a report of the pit mutation testing.

parameter.name: reportsDirectory
parameter.description: Base directory where all pit reports are written to by the mutationCoverage goal. If timestampedReports is true (the default), then the actual reports will be contained in a subdirectory within this directory. If timestampedReports is false, the actual reports will be in this directory.

parameter.name: siteReportDescription
parameter.description: Determines the description of the report that is displayed under the description of the site's Project Reports section

parameter.name: siteReportDirectory
parameter.description: Specifies the directory under ${project.reporting.outputDirectory} where the pit reports will be written. The value of this parameter will be relative to ${project.reporting.outputDirectory}. For example, if this parameter is set to "foo", then the pit reports will be located in ${project.reporting.outputDirectory}/foo.

parameter.name: siteReportName
parameter.description: Determines the name of the report that is displayed under the site's Project Reports section

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: When set to true, indicates that generation of the site report should be skipped.

parameter.name: sourceDataFormats
parameter.description: Determines what type of data file should be used to generate the report. Currently, only "HTML" is supported which does nothing more than copy the HTML report generated by the mutationCoverage goal into the site directory. However, the plan is to accept any source format that can be specified in the outputFormats parameter of the mutationCoverage goal.

siteReportDescription.default-value: Report of the pit test coverage

mojo.description: Goal which runs a coverage mutation report only for files that have been modified or introduced locally based on the source control configured in maven.

parameter.name: additionalClasspathElements
parameter.description: List of additional classpath entries to use when looking for tests and mutable code. These will be used in addition to the classpath with which PIT is launched.

parameter.name: basedir
parameter.description: Project basedir

parameter.name: classpathDependencyExcludes
parameter.description: List of classpath entries, formatted as "groupId:artifactId", which should not be included in the classpath when running mutation tests. Modelled after the corresponding Surefire/Failsafe property.

parameter.name: connectionType
parameter.description: Connection type to use when querying scm for changed files. Can either be "connection" or "developerConnection".

parameter.name: coverageThreshold
parameter.description: Line coverage threshold at which to fail build

parameter.name: detectInlinedCode
parameter.description: Detect inlined code

parameter.name: environmentVariables
parameter.description:
environment configuration
Value pairs may be used by pitest plugins.

parameter.name: excludedClasses
parameter.description: Classes not to mutate or run tests from

parameter.name: excludedGroups
parameter.description: TestNG Groups/JUnit Categories to exclude

parameter.name: excludedMethods
parameter.description: Methods not to mutate

parameter.name: exportLineCoverage
parameter.description: Export line coverage data

parameter.name: failWhenNoMutations
parameter.description: Throw error if no mutations found

parameter.name: historyInputFile
parameter.description: File to read history from for incremental analysis (can be same as output file)

parameter.name: historyOutputFile
parameter.description: File to write history information to for incremental analysis

parameter.name: include
parameter.description:
List of scm status to include. Names match those defined by the maven scm plugin.
Common values include ADDED,MODIFIED (the defaults) & UNKNOWN.

parameter.name: includedGroups
parameter.description: TestNG Groups/JUnit Categories to include

parameter.name: jvm
parameter.description: Path to java executable to use when running tests. Will default to executable in JAVA_HOME if none set.

parameter.name: jvmArgs
parameter.description: Arguments to pass to child processes

parameter.name: maxDependencyDistance
parameter.description: Maximum distance to look from test to class. Relevant when mutating static initializers

parameter.name: maxMutationsPerClass
parameter.description: Maximum number of mutations to allow per class

parameter.name: mutateStaticInitializers
parameter.description: Mutate static initializers

parameter.name: mutationEngine
parameter.description: Engine to use when generating mutations.

parameter.name: mutationThreshold
parameter.description: Mutation score threshold at which to fail build

parameter.name: mutationUnitSize
parameter.description: Maximum number of mutations to include in a single analysis unit.

parameter.name: mutators
parameter.description: Mutation operators to apply

parameter.name: outputFormats
parameter.description: Formats to output during analysis phase

parameter.name: parseSurefireConfig
parameter.description: When set will try and create settings based on surefire configuration. This may not give the desired result in some circumstances

parameter.name: pluginArtifactMap
parameter.description: Internal: Map of plugin artifacts.

parameter.name: pluginConfiguration
parameter.description:
Configuration properties.
Value pairs may be used by pitest plugins.

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: Internal: Project to interact with.

parameter.name: reportsDirectory
parameter.description: Base directory where all reports are written to.

parameter.name: scmRootDir
parameter.description: Base of scm root. For a multi module project this is probably the parent project.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: When set indicates that analysis of this project should be skipped

parameter.name: skipTests
parameter.description: honours common skipTests flag in a maven run

parameter.name: targetClasses
parameter.description: Classes to include in mutation test

parameter.name: targetTests
parameter.description: Tests to run

parameter.name: threads
parameter.description: Number of threads to use

parameter.name: timeoutConstant
parameter.description: Constant factor to allow for timeouts

parameter.name: timeoutFactor
parameter.description: Weighting to allow for timeouts

parameter.name: timestampedReports
parameter.description: Create timestamped subdirectory for report

parameter.name: useSlf4j
parameter.description: Use slf4j for logging

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: Output verbose logging
